lead_paragraph: Everton striker Romelu Lukaku has credited manager Ronald Koeman's clear and concise approach for helping him get off to a fast start this season and says it was the Dutchman's honesty that convinced him to stay at Goodison Park.

headline.print_headline: Lukaku Reaping Benefits of Koeman's Clarity
headline.main: Lukaku Reaping Benefits of Koeman's Clarity
